q_en: I am an Advanced Sewer. Please transfer all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, to Premier Sewers.

steps.sql: UPDATE cutting_tasks SET working_group_id = (SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Premier Sewers') WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2024-05-01' AND '2024-05-30';
steps.description: Update the working group for all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, to the working group with the name 'Premier Sewers'.
